title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html: So, I estimated the bottom for what appears to be an incipient depression. Before you discover what it is in Monday’s column, go ahead, take your best shot, and offer your rationale for it. I want to see US GDP and year… alternatively, if you don’t see a contraction ahead, explain why not.
content_text: So, I estimated the bottom for what appears to be an incipient depression.
